Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: You people are incredible. Here you have a group of medical professionals following protocols which have been developed by the medical community over decades. And what do Tea Brains want? A judge and an MBA--two bureaucrats--to make the medical decision instead--a medical decision that will determine that one person may live and another may die. That's your death panel. There is not one in Obamacare but the Tea Brains are determined to force one on us. All so they can score a few cheap political points. Good job. We have medical protocols in place to allocate organs. Sebelius does not have the authority to make an exception. She also has the wisdom not to seek that authority. It is too bad one judge and thousands of idiot Tea Brains don't have the same wisdom. Or the least bit of sense at all. Racists. Liars. Hypocrites. The definition of a Tea Brain. You are what you are and you demonstrate it repeatedly.

"two witnesses will testify to this" No, they won't. If there are any such witnesses they have not been made public. The reason this is in court is because an unarmed person walking home from the store was shot and killed under questionable circumstances.

It is time for all Americans to understand that if you are partially white (i.e., Mr. Zimmerman is part white, part black and part Hispanic) you do NOT have the right to protect yourself or your property when you are attacked by a 17 year old partially black young man who is carrying a screwdriver. This is especially true when you are the block captain of your community watch program, and you are legally carrying a handgun for the protection of yourself and others. And if you do protect yourself, while you are getting your brains beat out on a sidewalk, you will be charged with first or second degree murder, and spend the rest of your days in a state or federal prison because you performed your community service. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

I don't think there are that many shares of T. You probably work for the government and added too many zeros. 7 Billion times $35.99 is one quarter of a trillion dollars and is about the amount the USA goes into debt every three months. Only a government employee could even think in those terms.
Sorry. Big oops on my part. It was a 7 million transaction. I am retired, but, being that free with my zeros, maybe the government will give me a part time job.

They are in fact just some conservative thinking people that don't see the world in the same colors as your dreams. Get over it.

Winholder, perhaps you have forgotten the sequence of events. 1. Zimmerman/Martin incident happens and Martin is killed. 2. Due to Florida's Stand your Ground law, Zimmerman is declared innocent without trial (and, by proxy, Martin declared guilty of assaulting Zimmerman without trial). 3. People like me say this is something that deserves a trial. 4. Tea Brains say no, it was clearly self-defense, no need for a trial. I don't know if Zimmerman will be found guilty or not. But I do think we need to have a trial to determine if he is innocent or guilty. THAT is what I am defending--the need for a trial. It is the conservative media and their Tea Brain sheep who think he should just be declared innocent without a trial and have declared Martin guilty without trial. My personal opinion is that Zimmerman's actions rise to the level of manslaughter, not murder. But a jury will decide if he is guilty of that, murder or nothing at all. But you can't just chase and kill an unarmed kid and not go to trial.
